content: Decisions: 1) JARVIS_PRETTY_OUTPUT default is True (Windows forced False); code and docs updated (docs/jarvis_book/9.附录.md). 2) JARVIS_FORCE_SAVE_MEMORY default is False; code updated and docs already consistent. Note: JARVIS_WEB_SEARCH_PLATFORM/MODEL return None in code while docs show ""; treat both as 'unset' for consistency.
